explains: v. 取代，代替；使（人或动物群体）离开家园；移动，转移

sentences.en: Renewable energy will have to displace fossil fuels to a much greater extent in the future to avoid unacceptable climate risks.
sentences.cn: 为了避免不可接受的气候风险，未来可再生能源将不得不更大程度地取代化石燃料。

sentences.en: Humans are the ultimate invasive species—when they move into new territory, they often displace the wildlife that was already living there.
sentences.cn: 人类是终极入侵物种——当他们进入新的领地时，他们经常会取代已经生活在那里的野生动物。

sentences.en: This is because, according to Archimedes' principle of displacement, floating objects displace their own weight in water.
sentences.cn: 这是因为，根据阿基米德的位移原理，漂浮物在水中会转移自身的重量。
